web_snippets: Homepage | 32-D918 | 617-715-4298 | jkhoo@mit.edu. Justin Khoo joined the faculty in 2013, after receiving his PhD from Yale.
Justin Khoo ... I am an associate professor of philosophy at MIT. Before coming to MIT, I did my graduate work in philosophy at Yale, and was an undergraduate at ...
Justin Khoo is an associate professor at MIT. He works in the philosophy of language, on topics that lie at the intersection of philosophy and linguistics.
